name: Aye Aye (AI)
description:
Story:

 You’re a new crew member of The Great Geseppi, Captain Charles’s boat. You’ve been tasked with  shooting down competing pirates! Keep those pirates “at bay” to not disappoint Captain Charles.

Notes:

  •  I used LetsMakeAGame to get the game idea of A Pirate Clicker.
  • This is done, but I know I will make  some updates to it.
